mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AUTHOR ORDER BY AUTHOR_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTHOR (AUTHOR_KR_NAME, AUTHOR_CONTENT, AUTHOR_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, USE_YN) VALUES (#{authorKrName}, #{authorContent}, #{authorThumbnailImage}, #{useYn})
mapper.update: UPDATE AUTHOR AUTHOR_KR_NM = #{authorKrNm}, AUTHOR_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE = #{authorThumbnailImage}, AUTHOR_CONTENT = #{authorContent}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, UPDATE_DATE = NOW() WHERE AUTHOR_SEQ = #{authorSeq}
